00030 {

00045 static error_t parse_opt(int key, char *arg, struct argp_state *state)
00046 {
00047         struct passwd_options_t *args = state-&gt;input;
00048         arg = NULL;
00049 
00050         switch (key) {
00051         case 'u':
00052         case 'k':
00053                 args-&gt;update_if_expired = 1;
00054                 break;
00055 
00056         case ARGP_KEY_INIT:
00057                 args-&gt;name = NULL;
00058                 state-&gt;child_inputs[0] = &amp;args-&gt;setpasswd;
00059                 break;
00060 
00061         case ARGP_KEY_ARG:
00062                 if (args-&gt;name)
00063                         argp_usage(state);
00064 
00065                 args-&gt;name = arg;
00066                 break;
00067 
00068         default:
00069                 return ARGP_ERR_UNKNOWN;
00070         }
00071 
00072         return 0;
00073 }

00082 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00083 {
00084         error_t status = 0;
00085 
00086         /* argp parser */
00087         static const struct argp_child child_parsers[] = {
00088                 { &amp;setpasswd_argp, 0, 0, 0 },
00089                 { 0, 0, 0, 0 }
00090         };
00091 
00093         static struct argp_option options[] = {
00094                 { &quot;update-if-expired&quot;, 'u', 0, 0,
00095                 N_(&quot;Only update password if it has expired&quot;), 0 },
00096                 { &quot;keep-tokens&quot;, 'k', 0, OPTION_HIDDEN,
00097                 N_(&quot;Only update password if it has expired&quot;), 0 },
00098                 { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 }
00099         };
00100 
00101         struct argp argp = {
00102                 .options        = options,
00103                 .parser         = parse_opt,
00104                 .args_doc       = args_doc,
00105                 .doc            = doc,
00106                 .children       = child_parsers,
00107         };
00108 
00109         struct passwd_options_t args;
00110 
00111         argp_program_version_hook = version;
00112 
00113         errno = 0;
00114 
00115         /* Initialise support for locales, and set the program-name */
00116         if ((status = init_locales(PRG_NAME)))
00117                 return status;
00118 
00119         
00120 
00121         /* Parse command line */
00122         if ((status = argp_parse(&amp;argp, argc, argv, 0, 0, &amp;args))) {
00123                 if (status != EINVAL)
00124                         fprintf(stderr,
00125                                 _(&quot;%s: `%s' failed; %s\n&quot;),
00126                                 progname, &quot;argp_parse()&quot;, strerror(status));
00127 
00128                 return status;
00129         }
00130 
00131         return setpasswd(args.name, 0, args.setpasswd.removepass, 
00132                          args.setpasswd.showhash, args.update_if_expired);
